title.rendered: Find A Room For Rent In Grand Rapids

content.rendered:
Unfold the treasures of the “River City”. Let us explore the city’s serene yet fast culture, as we grab the best rooms for rent in Grand Rapids for you!

Getting to know Grand Rapids

Multiple stages with live performances, a variety of food stalls, and a blend of the commercial and authentic side of art, is what the city provides its residents and tourists every year.

The USA’s first hydro-electric generator was put in the city back in 1880, making Grand Rapids an early center for the automobile industry.

We will guide you through cheap rooms for rent in Grand Rapids, and make sure you don’t miss out on the culture trips while you’re there!

Finding rooms for rent in Grand Rapids

Find A Room For Rent In Grand Rapids

Living away from home requires that you keep to a tight budget. Stick with Roomi to find average rooms for rent in Grand Rapids and choose the most affordable yet perfect one for you! Pick from a plethora of options – we’ve mastered the art of renting and will help you explore awesomely cheap rooms for rent in Grand Rapids!

Top neighborhoods in Grand Rapids

  • Fulton Heights: A safe and serene neighborhood with a touch of urbanization. If you like going out and exploring restaurants, this area is the right pick for you!
  • South Hill: Home to many young professionals, South Hill is one of the best places to explore rooms for rent in Grand Rapids. With many parks and cute coffee bars on offer, you will find yourself right at home!
  • Midtown: If dense suburban life attracts you, then living in Midtown could be just the ticket. Home to many families and working-age groups, this side of the town provides a fast-paced life!

Average rent in Grand Rapids

University life in Grand Rapids

The awesome campus placements and job opportunities at Grand Rapids provide for a safe and dynamic work culture for your future.

Here are some of the universities in Grand Rapids:

  1. Calvin University
  2. Aquinas College
  3. Grand Rapids Community College
  4. Davenport University
  5. Grand Valley State University

How transit-friendly is Grand Rapids?

Amongst the many cheap rooms for rent in Grand Rapids, what if the one you like is at a distance from your college? Don’t worry, you’ll figure out a way to get there with one of the USA’s best transportation system.

1. Bus

The Rapids is known to make life easy for its residents and the tourists. A bus service that will take you around the city in the most accessible way possible connecting Downtown with various city attractions making everything just an easy walk away.

2. DASH Downtown

Plan Downtown tours with DASH, a free shuttle bus service. That means you can find cheap rooms for rent in Grand Rapids – and save money doing it!

3. Bike

Ride across the city and explore the beautiful landscape. Grand Rapids also provides off-road biking options like forest and mountain trail biking, which would excite any mountain biker!

4. Airport

Gerald R Ford International Airport is centrally located and connects to some of the major cities of the United States.

Nightlife in Grand Rapids

Party and have the time of your life in this city. If going out keeps you happy, then Grand Rapids will have you grinning all night. Here are some of the places and experiences (including a pedal pub cruiser!) that you shouldn’t miss:

  • The Intersection
  • Great Lakes Pub Cruiser
  • Dr. Grins Comedy Club
  • Charlie’s Bar & Grill

Culture of Grand Rapids

Welcome to the hub of art, nature, and culture. Grand Rapids has so much to offer, especially if museums, gardens, and history charm you. Check out the list below:

  • John Ball Zoo
  • Gerald R Ford Presidential Museum
  • Van Andel Arena
  • Grand Rapids Public Museum

D’you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers find rooms for rent in Grand Rapids. With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
